name: 7th International Research Conference on Humanities & Social Sciences
content: The International Conference on Humanities and Social Sciences invites researchers from around the world to submit their abstracts for presentation at IRCHSS 2020, to be held in Colombo, Sri Lanka on August 13 and 14th, 2020\. IRCHSS 2020 will feature a wide range of talks on humanities and social sciences, a session of poster presentations, a symposium on language teaching and learning, a networking dinner and a cultural show. Submit your abstract on or before March 10th, 2020 for any of the following categories: Oral Presentations (15 minutes for the presentation and 5 minutes for discussion) Poster Presentation USJ Symposium on Language Teaching and Learning
